section.title: Version
section.p: The current version is 0.7.5. The integration should be tested further to increase its stability and assure that it is applicable to many different environments. Currently this release supports the features listed here, these features pass the related testcases.

section.title: Todo
section.p: The following topics will be implemented in the future:

ol.li: User defined collections/types (which extend the current EMF collections)
Extend XML Schema support to xsd:any, etc.
Automatic validation of persisted EMF objects at commit

section.title: Next Steps
section.p: Integrating EMF with other tools such as:

ul.li: Other OR layers such as Versant
